business.headline: Claiming bias, same-sex couple approaches court over uneven tax: ReportThe petition was admitted by a bench of Justice BP Colabawalla and Justice Firdoush Pooniwalla, which has also issued a notice to the Attorney General as the case raises a constitutional question.

PM Modi announces next-generation GST reform with significantly lower ratesDuring his Independence Day address, Prime Minister Narendra Modi announced a sweeping overhaul of the GST system, promising to unveil a "next-generation" tax regime with substantially lower rates this Diwali, which he hailed as a festive gift from the Centre.

Rs 15,000 from government on 1st private-sector job: PM's big youth schemePM Modi in his Independence Day speech said that the Pradhan Mantri Viksit Bharat Rojgar Yojana will create nearly 3.5 crore new employment opportunities for the youth.

GST cut coming soon? What to expect after PM Modi's big Diwali promisePrime Minister Narendra Modi's announcement has set expectations for a substantial overhaul of the current multi-slab GST structure, which has been in place since 2017.

India to roll out its own semiconductor chips by end of 2025: PM ModiSpeaking on the country's 79th Independence Day, PM Modi hoisted the national flag for the 12th consecutive time before outlining the government's plans for technology, energy, and economic reforms.

PM's Double Diwali promise, says next-generation GST with much lower taxes soonPrime Minister Narendra Modi promised the roll-out a next-generation GST regime with substantially lower taxes before this Diwali, calling it a major festive gift to benefit individuals, MSMEs, and the economy.

5 IPOs to open for bidding next week: Which is best based on GMP?Next week will see the IPOs of Patel Retail, Vikram Solar, Gem Aromatics, Shreeji Shipping Global and Mangal Electrical. Together, they are looking to raise Rs 3,584.09 crore from the market.

Why your 45-day credit card grace period might be a debt trap, explains CAMany believe a credit card's 45-day grace period means free borrowing time. But as an expert explains, even a small unpaid balance can turn it into a costly debt trap.

Sensex, Nifty end marginally higher as investors await Trump-Putin meet outcomeThe S&P BSE Sensex gained 57.75 points to end at 80,597.66, while the NSE Nifty50 added just 11.95 points to close at 24,631.30.

S&P upgrades India's sovereign rating to 'BBB' on growth, fiscal disciplineThe move comes more than a year after S&P revised India's outlook to positive from stable in May 2024, on the back of robust growth and improved expenditure quality. The rating agency also revised India's transfer and convertibility assessment to 'A-' from 'BBB+'.

Fresh scrutiny on FedEx, UPS, DHL top brass in antitrust case: ReportExecutives set to be questioned include Subhasish Chakraborty, Managing Director of DTDC Express; R.S. Subramanian, Managing Director of DHL Express India, and more.

7 major income tax changes in 2025 that will impact your money2025 has brought a wave of changes to India's income tax rules, from bigger exemptions to extended filing deadlines. Here's a simple breakdown of the seven key updates that could directly affect your finances.

entertainment.headline: Hina Khan praises Mrunal's apology to Bipasha, calls both actors phenomenal women"Wisdom comes with time," wrote Hina Khan, appreciating Mrunal Thakur for owning up to a "teenager's mistake". She called both her and Bipasha Basu "phenomenal women" who have broken barriers in their own ways.

Rajinikanth, at 74, lifts weights and flaunts his fitness in rare workout videoSuperstar Rajinikanth's workout video has emerged on social media and is going viral. At 74, he is one of the fittest actors in India.

Kim Tae-hee says there is a pressure to look beautiful in K-dramas but…Kim Tae-hee makes her Hollywood debut with the spy thriller Butterfly on Prime Video. The series combines thrilling action with emotional family themes, marking a new chapter in her career.

Sunny Deol roars in Border 2 Independence Day poster, release date outThe makers of 'Border 2' have announced the release date of the film on the occasion of Independence Day. The film is set to release early next year.

Raj Kundra's kidney offer to guru stuns Shilpa Shetty. Watch viral clipActor Shilpa Shetty and her husband Raj Kundra recently visited Premanand Maharaj's ashram in Mathura. This visit came after reports of Rs 60 crore fraud allegations against him emerged.

Butterfly review: Kim Daniel Dae's series is stylish and slick but lacks grit'Butterfly' blends espionage and fractured family ties in a stylish South Korean setting. Despite thrilling action sequences, the series lacks emotional depth and complexity.

PM Modi is the biggest feminist in the world: Kangana Ranaut's big praiseKangana Ranaut, in a recent interview, called Prime Minister Narendra Modi the 'biggest feminist' in the world. She commended PM Modi for his initiatives supporting women, highlighting his impact in India.

Kamal fan, Rajini film: Coolie reminds us Superstar belongs to both campsLokesh Kanagaraj's 'Coolie' is proof that Superstar's appeal has always transcended fan rivalries. In the hands of a lifelong Kamal Haasan devotee, Rajinikanth gets space to swagger, to emote, and to own the screen with the ease only he can summon. In Tamil cinema, loyalties may run deep, but Rajinikanth belongs to everyone.

War 2 box office Day 1: Hrithik, Jr NTR's spy thriller mints Rs 50 crore in India'War 2' box office collection Day 1: Hrithik Roshan and Jr NTR's 'War 2', directed by Ayan Mukerji, earned over Rs 50 crore on its opening day in India. The film released in theatres on August 14.

Coolie box office Day 1: Rajinikanth's actioner takes bumper opening globallyRajinikanth and director Lokesh Kanagaraj's 'Coolie' has taken a bumper opening at the box office on its first day in theatres. The film released in multiple languages on August 14.

War 2 Day 1 early box office: Hrithik-Jr NTR may have spy universe's lowest openerThe trade industry was expecting 'War 2' to open in the range of Rs 40 crore nett in Hindi - like 'Tiger 3' - but things don't seem promising enough. The film might have just opened in the range of Rs 60 crore in the overall domestic market.

Wednesday Season 2 Part 2 trailer: Jenna Ortega meets spirit-guide as mayhem unfoldsThe trailer for the last four episodes of 'Wednesday: Season 2 - Part 2' has been released on Netflix. The show is headed towards more chaos as Wednesday wakes from a coma and meets a new spirit guide.

Coolie early box office Day 1: Rajinikanth inks Tamil history in Rs 150 crore goldRajinikanth has cemented his God-like stature in the Tamil film industry as his film 'Coolie' made a thunderous opening of around Rs 150 crore gross worldwide. At least the initial trends suggest the same. Here's the detailed report.

Mrunal Thakur apologises for body-shaming Bipasha Basu, calls it a teenager's mistakeActor Mrunal Thakur has apologised for body-shaming actor Bipasha Basu in a resurfaced video. The apology comes amid widespread criticism and renewed conversations on body positivity in Bollywood.

Taylor Swift thanks Travis Kelce on his podcast for introducing her to footballSinger Taylor Swift has revealed that she knew nothing about football until meeting NFL star Travis Kelce. She also announced her new album on his podcast, highlighting their growing bond and shared interests.

Bipasha Basu shares nostalgic video after Ronaldo announces engagementActor Bipasha Basu recalled her encounter with footballer Cristiano Ronaldo on social media. The nostalgic video was from the time she shared on stage with Ronaldo. Her post came shortly after Ronaldo and Rodriguez confirmed their engagement.

Homi Adajania sets the record straight as Kriti Sanon begins Cocktail 2 in ItalyDirector Homi Adajania confirmed that actor Kriti Sanon is confirmed to star in 'Cocktail 2'. He shared that the shooting schedule would soon start in Italy. The film will reportedly also star Shahid Kapoor and Rashmika Mandanna.

Orry slams Mrunal Thakur body-shaming Bipasha Basu in viral videoAn old video of Mrunal Thakur making remarks about Bipasha Basu has resurfaced, causing a stir on social media. Influencer Orhan Awatramani aka Orry also responded to the viral clip.

Sholay@50: Its iconic dialogues, and how to use themSholay (1975), directed by Ramesh Sippy, is not just a film; it's a cultural juggernaut that has shaped India's cinematic and social landscape for decades. From Gabbar Singh's villainous zingers to Basanti's chatterbox charm, its dialogues have hijacked India's lingua franca, folklore, and meme culture like a rogue Dhanno on a rampage.

general news.headline: Modi stands like a wall, won't compromise on farmers: PM's message to TrumpPM Modi's shout-out to farmers in his 12th consecutive Independence Day speech is a subtle message directed at US President Donald Trump amid a stalemate over the trade deal.

Sudarshan Chakra, Make-in-India: PM's I-Day speech lays out Naya Bharat visionPM Modi's record 103-minute Independence Day speech hailed Operation Sindoor, vowed Make-in-India dominance, and defied US tariff threats, declaring a "new normal" in fighting terror and an "unstoppable" rise in global markets for home-grown products.

PM's Double Diwali promise, says next-generation GST with much lower taxes soonPrime Minister Narendra Modi promised the roll-out a next-generation GST regime with substantially lower taxes before this Diwali, calling it a major festive gift to benefit individuals, MSMEs, and the economy.

Nuns Arrest: After Muslims, Target Christians?On July 26, two Christian nuns, originally from Kerala, were detained at the Durg police station in BJP-ruled Chhattisgarh, accused of human trafficking and forced conversion.

When a British chief justice unfurled, saluted Tricolour, that too before NehruOn August 14, 1947, midnight, an unlikely hand unfurled the Indian flag. Leonard Stone, the last British Chief Justice of the Bombay high court, unfurled the Tricolour, while interim PM Jawaharlal Nehru was delivering the 'Tryst with Destiny' speech in Delhi. Stone saluted the Tricolour hours before Nehru's ceremonial flag-hoisting at Delhi's Red Fort.

Rs 15,000 from government on 1st private-sector job: PM's big youth schemePM Modi in his Independence Day speech said that the Pradhan Mantri Viksit Bharat Rojgar Yojana will create nearly 3.5 crore new employment opportunities for the youth.

J&K cloudburst deaths rise to 60, hundreds still missing as rescue ops intensifyIntense rescue operations are underway in Jammu and Kashmir's Kishtwar, where a massive cloudburst has killed at least 60 people and buried several others.

In PM Modi's I-day praise for RSS, Congress suspects retirement benefitThe Congress has been calling for PM Modi's 'retirement' after RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat suggested that political leaders should step aside by the age of 75.

Sunny Deol roars in Border 2 Independence Day poster, release date outThe makers of 'Border 2' have announced the release date of the film on the occasion of Independence Day. The film is set to release early next year.

Cue from Krishna for India's Iron Dome. What's Sudarshan Chakra Mission?In his Independence Day speech, PM Modi announced plans for the Sudarshan Chakra Mission, a decade-long plan to shield India's skies from aerial threats. The speech came a day ahead of Janmashtami. Drawing inspiration from Lord Krishna's legendary weapon, the indigenous project will deploy advanced defences to protect both strategic and civilian infrastructure, and will have precision strike capabilities. It will be similar to Israel's Iron Dome.

Trump says tariffs on India 'probably' pushed Putin to negotiating tableTrump noted that the additional tariffs he imposed against India "essentially took them out of buying oil from Russia," adding that India was Moscow's second-largest customer.

Hope in the desert: Inside India's first Mars baseAs Isro prepares to launch Indians to space and then on to the Moon by 2040, the first steps are being taken in a remote location in Ladakh's Tso Kar where a new habitat simulated how astronauts would live and work on the Moon in the coming years. We bring you exclusive behind the scene details from India's first Mars base.

All noise: DK Shivakumar calls Dharmasthala case 'conspiracy to tarnish legacy'Karnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar alleged the Dharmasthala mass burial case was a conspiracy to tarnish its centuries-old legacy. He said it arose from one unknown complainant. He termed the case "an empty trunk" with no substance.

Claiming bias, same-sex couple approaches court over uneven tax: ReportThe petition was admitted by a bench of Justice BP Colabawalla and Justice Firdoush Pooniwalla, which has also issued a notice to the Attorney General as the case raises a constitutional question.

PM's semiconductor chip announcement gets Jairam Ramesh's pathological liar replyJairam Ramesh dismissed PM Modi's claim that India lost 50-60 years in semiconductor development, citing the operational status of Semiconductors Complex Ltd since 1983.

Mahindra Freedom NU live updates: Vision T, X, S, SXT concepts revealedAs the nation celebrates the 79th Independence Day, Mahindra showcased four concept cars, underpinned by a new versatile platform for its future products.

Youth-led space exploration takes center stage in PM's I-Day speechThe Prime Minister lauded the achievements of Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, whose recent space mission exemplifies India's rise in global space endeavours.

Dhoni retirement anniversary: How long can fans expect India legend to play IPL?MS Dhoni remains a key figure for Chennai Super Kings, combining sharp tactics with big-match skills, even as knee issues limit his game. Whether he plays in IPL 2026 or retires, his presence, wit, and winning mindset keep him at the heart of the tournament.

Daam kam, dum zyada: PM Modi's big atmanirbhar push amid Trump tariffsIndependence Day speech: PM Modi gave a clarion call to develop 'our own fertilisers' and indigenous engines for fighter jets in his 12th consecutive Independence Day speech.

Girl dies as under-construction school balcony collapses in Rajasthan's UdaipurLocals in Rajasthan's Pathar Padi village blamed substandard construction for the collapse of an under-construction school balcony that killed one girl and injured another.

Nurse found hanging at Bengal nursing home; family alleges rape-murderThe opposition BJP and Communist Party of India (Marxist) (CPI(M)) held demonstrations in the area after the body was found, alleging that the nurse was murdered.

sports.headline: When Dhoni dropped me in Australia, I thought about ODI retirement: SehwagVirender Sehwag revealed he nearly retired from ODIs after being dropped by MS Dhoni in the 2008 tri-series in Australia. Sehwag revealed how Sachin Tendulkar talked him out of the decision, providing some key advice.

Bengal cricket board top official suspended over allegations of financial misconductThe Cricket Association of Bengal has suspended its joint secretary, Debabrata Das, over allegations of financial misconduct. The senior official is accused of accepting money in exchange for promising aspiring cricketers a place in the Bengal team.

Asia Cup T20s: Is Hardik Pandya's leadership dream slipping away?Asia Cup T20s: Once hailed as Rohit Sharma's successor in white-ball cricket, Hardik Pandya now watches others take vice-captaincy roles, leaving his long-held leadership ambitions hanging in the balance.

Gill will be around for a long time: Ravi Shastri in awe of India captainRavi Shastri hailed the India Test skipper Shubman Gill as 'regal' and backed him to be among the world's best for years to come. Gill had a record-breaking run with the bat during the recently concluded England series.

Dhoni retirement anniversary: How long can fans expect India legend to play IPL?MS Dhoni remains a key figure for Chennai Super Kings, combining sharp tactics with big-match skills, even as knee issues limit his game. Whether he plays in IPL 2026 or retires, his presence, wit, and winning mindset keep him at the heart of the tournament.

Badge, Bravery and Spirit: The new mantra driving Man United's revivalMan United CEO Omar Berrada has laid out a bold vision built on 'Badge, bravery, spirit' to revive the club's culture. Staff responses ranged from praise to pointed criticism, as Sesko and Bruno Fernandes drew plaudits for their loyalty.

Italy's Matteo Berrettini pulls out of tournament due to injuryItalian tennis star Matteo Berrettini has withdrawn from the 2025 US Open due to ongoing injury problems. Earlier, Bulgarian veteran Grigor Dimitrov and Spain's Paula Badosa also pulled out from the major.

AIFF to approach Supreme Court over the ISL impasse after discussions with clubsThe All India Football Federation (AIFF) has agreed to bring the prevailing legal uncertainty and administrative vacuum to the Supreme Court's attention next week, following a meeting with the lawyers of Indian Super League clubs on Thursday.

Chennai Grand Masters: Vincent Keymer secures draw to seal Masters titleVincent Keymer clinched the Chennai Grand Masters title with a round to spare, becoming its first sole champion. The German also broke into the live FIDE top 10, while the Masters' podium race and the Challengers title battle remain wide open.

AFI introduces SRY gene test for female athletes on World Athletics' directiveFollowing the World Athletics rule requiring female athletes to undergo an SRY gene test to compete in world ranking events, the Athletics Federation of India (AFI) has announced that eligible athletes must complete the mandatory test before next month's World Championships in Tokyo, Japan.

Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma should keep playing ODIs to guide juniors: RainaSuresh Raina says Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma's ODI experience is vital to guide India's youngsters. He also backs Mohammed Siraj as an all-format bowler after his stellar England series, highlighting his consistency and durability.

Italy's Matteo Berrettini pulls out of tournament due to injuryItalian tennis star Matteo Berrettini has withdrawn from the 2025 US Open due to ongoing injury problems. Earlier, Bulgarian veteran Grigor Dimitrov and Spain's Paula Badosa also pulled out from the major.

The German also broke into the live FIDE top 10, while the Masters' podium race and the Challengers title battle remain wide open.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.
